import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./Footer.css"; import { MdEmail } from "react-icons/md"; import { AiFillTwitterSquare, AiFillLinkedin, AiFillGithub, AiFillPhone } from "react-icons/ai"; import dataScienceLogo from "./images/dataScienceLogo.jpg"; const Footer = () => { const[logoHeight, setLogoHeight] = useState(window.innerHeight/14) const[logoWidth, setLogoWidth] = useState(window.innerWidth/4) window.onresize = function() { var widthWin = window.innerWidth var heightWin = window.innerHeight setLogoHeight(heightWin/14) setLogoWidth(widthWin/4) } return(

) } export default Footer;
